1001.name: Red Gear K320 Keyboard
1001.desp: Redgear Blaze membrane keyboard with 104 keys. Keystrokes - 10 million. 50IPS max speed and 10g acceleration. 5 million click lifetime.

1002.name: Logitech M100 Keyboard
1002.desp: Logitech Keyboard K120. A better typing experience that's built to last. Youâ€™ll enjoy a comfortable and quiet typing experience thanks to the low-profile keys that barely make a sound, and standard layout with full-size F-keys and number pad.

1003.name: Microsoft D21 Keyboard
1003.desp: This keyboard combines a spill-resistant keyboard with all the features you need and more with Microsoft quality and reliability. Enjoy plug-and-play setup; Windows Vista integration, Microsoft Xbox 360 compatibility.

1004.name: Dell T 90 Keyboard
1004.desp: The Dell Quiet Key Keyboard is designed ergonomically to maximize your comfort and productivity with sturdy and robust quiet key design for everyday business and personal usage. This keyboard features a standard set of 104 keys and its durability has been constructed for a long life span of repetitive use.
